text.28_Chapter, 9_Verse, 1_Comment: From the first of the woodcutter until the last of the drawers, like (I Samuel 15:3) 'From the infant to the suckling, from the ox to the ewe, from the camel to the donkey'
text.28_Chapter, 9_Verse, 0_Comment: Because it is fitting that their actions should be with the agreement of the fathers and husbands.
